item.description:
Come on the first event for Boston Ski, Snowboard and Outdoor Adventure meetup! Enjoy the nice Fall weather and a moderate hike not too far from Boston. Total hike will be between 4 to 6 miles.

We will meet at 10am in front of the main building at the park entrance - just beyond the Kasabuski Rink. I have a new Black Mazda SUV, you can also call me on my cell 617-596-5579.

for directions and more info check out
http://www.mass.gov/d...

If anyone is coming from The Somerville/Cambridge area we can carpool. We can meet at the Dunkin Donuts In Union Sq, Somerville at 9:15am.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet near main reservation building or call on my cell.

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Breakheart Reservation Hike - 1st Event!
